TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EnvelopedCms extends System.Object

summary.span: 類別，表示包裹資料的 CMS/PKCS #7 結構。

span.span: The class represents a CMS/PKCS #7 structure for enveloped data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 密碼編譯訊息語法 RFC 與這些內容的型別，指定 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息的檔案名稱副檔名與下列 MIME 類型。The Cryptographic Message Syntax RFC specifies the following MIME types and file name extensions for CMS/PKCS #7 messages with these content types. |內容類型Content type|MIME 類型MIME type|副檔名Extension| |------------------|---------------|---------------| |envelopedDataenvelopedData|應用程式/pkcs7 mimeapplication/pkcs7-mime|.p7m.p7m| |signedDatasignedData|應用程式/pkcs7 簽章application/pkcs7-signature|.p7s.p7c.p7s.p7c|

summary.span: 建立 類別的執行個體。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別具有下列的預設屬性值。The class has the following default property values. |屬性Property|預設值Default value| |--------------|-------------------| ||1.2.840.113549.1.7.1 （資料） 長度： 01.2.840.113549.1.7.1 (data)Length: zero| ||1.2.840.113549.3.7 (RSA_DES_EDE3_CBC)1.2.840.113549.3.7 (RSA_DES_EDE3_CBC)| 預設值收件者是。The default for recipients is .

summary.span: 屬性會擷取包裹 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息的內部內容資訊。

span.span: The property retrieves the inner content information for the enveloped CMS/PKCS #7 message.

value.span: 物件，表示來自包裹 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息的內部內容資訊。

span.span: A object that represents the inner content information from the enveloped CMS/PKCS #7 message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您呼叫任何解密方法，例如，之後才能檢視這個屬性，傳回的內容已加密。If you call any of the decrypt methods, such as , before viewing this property, the content returned is encrypted.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Decode(unsigned int8[] encodedMessage) cil managed

param.name: encodedMessage
param.span: 位元組值陣列，表示要解碼的資訊。

span.span: An array of byte values that represent the information to be decoded.

summary.span: 方法會解碼指定的包裹 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息，並重設 物件中的所有成員變數。

span.span: The method decodes the specified enveloped CMS/PKCS #7 message and resets all member variables in the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之前，應該呼叫這個方法或任何其他 EnvelopedCms.Decrypt 方法。This method should be called before or any other EnvelopedCms.Decrypt method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance unsigned int8[] Encode() cil managed

summary.span: 方法會將包裹 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息內容編碼，並傳回為位元組值陣列。

span.span: The method encodes the contents of the enveloped CMS/PKCS #7 message and returns it as an array of byte values.

summary.span: 加密動作必須在編碼之前完成。

span.span: Encryption must be done before encoding.

returns.span: 如果方法成功，會傳回表示編碼資訊的位元組值陣列。

span.span: If the method succeeds, the method returns an array of byte values that represent the encoded information.

returns.span: 如果方法失敗，就會擲回例外狀況。

span.span: If the method fails, it throws an exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 或另一個這個方法之前，必須呼叫方法。 or another method must be called before this method. 方法並不會導致填入的屬性。The method does not cause the property to be populated.

exception.span: 物件目前狀態的方法呼叫無效。

span.span: A method call was invalid for the object's current state.

summary.span: 加密 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息的內容。

span.span: Encrypts the contents of the CMS/PKCS #7 message.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Encrypt() cil managed

summary.span: 方法會加密 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息的內容。

span.span: The method encrypts the contents of the CMS/PKCS #7 message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會顯示您可以在其中選擇要加密訊息的收件者的使用者介面。This method displays a user interface in which you choose the recipients for whom to encrypt the message. 這需要確認目前的處理序正在執行*使用者互動模式*，亦即，屬性設定為`true`。This requires that the current process is running in *user interactive mode*, meaning that the property is set to `true`. 處理程序是通常於使用者互動模式中，除非它是服務處理程序或 Web 應用程式內執行。A process is normally in user interactive mode unless it is a service process or running inside a Web application. 使用者介面只會顯示的憑證，其有效期間內，且具有金鑰編密] 或 [金鑰使用方式中包含的金鑰協議。The user interface will only present certificates that are within their validity period and that have key encipherment or key agreement included in their key usage. 方法並不會導致填入的屬性。The method does not cause the property to be populated. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 下列權限，才能顯示使用者介面：The following permissions are required to display the user interface: -

exception.span: 密碼編譯作業無法完成。

span.span: A cryptographic operation could not be completed.

span.span: The method encrypts the contents of the CMS/PKCS #7 message by using the specified recipient information.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Encrypt(class System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection recipients) cil managed

param.name: recipients
param.span: 集合，表示收件者清單的資訊。

span.span: A collection that represents the information for the list of recipients.

summary.span: 方法會使用指定之收件者清單的資訊，將 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息的內容加密。

span.span: The method encrypts the contents of the CMS/PKCS #7 message by using the information for the specified list of recipients.

summary.span: 使用訊息加密金鑰透過對稱加密演算法 (例如三重 DES)，將訊息加密。

span.span: The message is encrypted by using a message encryption key with a symmetric encryption algorithm such as triple DES.

summary.span: 訊息加密金鑰接著會與各個收件者的公開金鑰一同加密。

span.span: The message encryption key is then encrypted with the public key of each recipient.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法並不會導致填入的屬性。The method does not cause the property to be populated.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RecipientInfos As RecipientInfoCollection

summary.span: 屬性會擷取與包裹 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息關聯的收件者資訊。

span.span: The property retrieves the recipient information associated with the enveloped CMS/PKCS #7 message.
A collection that represents the recipient information.

value.span: 如果沒有收件者存在，屬性值將為空集合。

span.span: If no recipients exist, the property value is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然這個屬性是唯讀的修改中的物件可藉由使用其屬性。Although this property is read-only, a modification to the objects in the can be done by using their properties. 屬性不會呼叫的結果填入方法或任何多載 EnvelopedCms.Encrypt 方法。The property is not populated as a result of calling the method nor any of the overloaded EnvelopedCms.Encrypt methods.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UnprotectedAttributes As CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection

summary.span: 屬性 (property) 會擷取與 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息關聯之未保護的 (未加密) 屬性 (attribute)。

span.span: The property retrieves the unprotected (unencrypted) attributes associated with the enveloped CMS/PKCS #7 message.

summary.span: 未保護的屬性不會加密，因此 物件內不會具有資料機密性。

span.span: Unprotected attributes are not encrypted, and so do not have data confidentiality within an object.

value.span: 集合，表示未保護的屬性 (attribute)。

span.span: A collection that represents the unprotected attributes.

value.span: 如果沒有未保護的屬性 (Attribute)，屬性 (Property) 值將為空集合。

span.span: If no unprotected attributes exist, the property value is an empty collection.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Version As Integer
public: property int Version { int get(); };

summary.span: 屬性會擷取包裹 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息的版本。

span.span: The property retrieves the version of the enveloped CMS/PKCS #7 message.

value.span: int 值，表示包裹 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息的版本。

span.span: An int value that represents the version of the enveloped CMS/PKCS #7 message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 版本會決定訊息是否為 PKCS #7 訊息或密碼編譯訊息語法 (CMS) 訊息。The version determines whether the message is a PKCS #7 message or a Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS) message. CMS 是 PKCS #7 的較新的超集。CMS is a newer superset of PKCS #7.
